sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SGParameterScreenHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>SGParameterScreenHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SGParameterScreenHelper = Class.create();
SGParameterScreenHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	getParameterScreenReferenceQualifier: function(){
		return "sys_class_name=sys_sg_parameter_screen^ORsys_class_name=sys_sg_scripted_screen";
	},
	getFilteredScreenRefQual: function(){
		return "sys_class_name!=sys_sg_parameter_screen^sys_class_name!=sys_sg_scripted_screen";
	},
	getInputTypeRefQual: function(){
		return "name!=signature";
	},
	getAutofillVariableRefQual: function(current){
		if (current.parameter_section) {
			return "parameter_section=" + current.parameter_section;
		} else if (current.parameter_screen) {
			return "parameter_screen=" + current.parameter_screen;
		}

		return "parameter_screen=^parameter_section=";
	},
    type: 'SGParameterScreenHelper'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-11-30 23:16:29</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6804687173302010470a87086bf6a7ec</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SGParameterScreenHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile Parameter Screen Plugin" source="com.glide.sg.parameter">3dedb8cb6d2220100acb70b353433083</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6804687173302010470a87086bf6a7ec</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-02-22 22:38:45</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>804</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
